Package pacman.ghost

Class Clyde

  • Object
    • Entity
      • Ghost
        • Clyde
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Moveable
    public class Clyde
extends Ghost
    Clyde is a ghost that behaves in a very scared manner when close to a hunter. When not chasing the hunter down, clyde likes to hang out in the bottom left corner of the board in a orange glow.
    Implement this for Assignment 1
